meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one million cycles per second.
meanings.sent1: The computer processor operates at one megacycle per second.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the signal frequency in megacycles.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver joked that his engine could run a megacycle in a blink of an eye.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was a megacycle of energy and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The hummingbird's wings beat at a megacycle, creating a mesmerizing blur.

meanings.definition: A period of one million cycles.
meanings.sent1: The pendulum completed a megacycle in record time.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake caused a megacycle of vibrations in the ground.
meanings.sent3: The children on the carousel laughed as they spun through a megacycle of rotations.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed in a megacycle of ebbs and flows.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky in a colorful megacycle of bursts.
